name: HappyCoffeeLLC
description:
"On behalf of HappyCoffeeLLC, we hope you enjoy your state-of-the-art HappyCoffeeMachine, where you are able to create delicious coffee in a user-friendly environment tailored specifically to our customers needs. Ensure you dish out the correct drinks to your paying customers, or else you will recieve an insurmountable loss of funds."

HappyCoffeeLLC is a game I've been working on for about a week now, and is something I'll continue to put hours into in the near future. It is supposed to be a comedy-horror puzzle game, where you need to navigate an archaic, confusing text-based interface to create cups of coffee out of thin air. As the game progresses, methods for making drinks become harder, and questions about what exactly this strange HappyCoffeeLLC corporation - or this strange black & white world - really is.

This prototype will take around 15 minutes to complete. It consists of serving 9 customers in total. No gameplay is final - some things may be too frustrating or just plain not fun, so I'm willing to tweak anything. I also haven't begun writing any sort of story at all. I hope you enjoy!
